ctx: induction ir as [| ir' irs IH].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros ir H1 k H2. intros H3. induction ir as [| ir' irs IH]. - simpl in H3. contradiction. - simpl in H3. destruct H2 as [H2 | H2]. + injection H3. intros H3'. rewrite <- H3'. left. left. reflexivity. + apply IH in H3. destruct H3 as [H3 | H3]. * left. right. apply H3. * right. apply H3.
